title: I heard while working at Sunny Point during Desert Storm, that during wwll the light ship at frying pan shoals was in th habit of radioing to the Navy every time they saw a german U boat in the area until one night when a U boat quietly(apparently on battery power) came along side the light shiip and told the light ship skipper that if he radioed again, the U boat would sink him. Have you heard anything about this?
